**StormVZ** owned and operated by **Web Phase Limited** (Registered in England & Wales), as a hosting provider we are very well aware of how important websites are to businesses and is more aware that the value and functionality of the website also depends on the performance of its web host. Excellent service and reliability is what matters and is what StormVZ is all about.

We have expanded to **4** diverse locations for our VPS customers, with the ability to choose from Maidenhead UK, West Coast, Central & East Coast of USA. All our servers have 2 x gbit links on a dedicated port to ensure network speed is quick always, even during peak times!
